content: Hey everyone! :wave: Just bootstrapping this stream with a link to the issue on our libs repo about coming up with a team charter: https://github.com/rust-lang/libs-team/issues/1
That has a link to the HackMD, which is also here: https://hackmd.io/FasfT5zzQZuy0c0AxYQRBg

@Ashley Mannix One section that I could could be expanded on is the "So whatâ€™s the role of Libs?". It mentions things like "To establish project groups through MCPs." but I think that doesn't really explain the role of libs. I think it would to explain there why the libs team would want to create a project group, and I think it would be good to include examples of project groups the team wouldn't want to spin up that people might propose.
Thatâ€™s a good idea! The whole thing definitely needs a lot more fleshing out ðŸ™‚ Iâ€™ll get back to it shortly once a few other things are off my backlog

Iâ€™ve done some work on the doc: https://hackmd.io/FasfT5zzQZuy0c0AxYQRBg?both

It should be getting close to putting into the RFC template form but any more feedback would be great!
